content.text: Match ends, Valencia 3, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1.
Second Half ends, Valencia 3, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1.
Attempt saved. Pablo Piatti (Valencia) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jeremy Mathieu.
Corner,  Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Conceded by Mehmet Topal.
Attempt missed. Jordi Alba (Valencia) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left following a set piece situation.
Roberto Soldado (Valencia) wins a free kick on the right wing.
